name: DATAFLOW
description: Control the network dataflow! Pass data packets, catch e-mails and bonuses, destroy spam and viruses! Earn points and buy upgrades! Show your skill to get all things done at once!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 64 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated video DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated audio
